name: Atari Pitfall! Remake
description:
Synopsis

This project is a remake of the original Pitfall! game released for the Atari, I've aimed to keep to the original as much as possible. 

You play as Pitfall Harry, running through an endless world filled with creatures out to harm you and bountiful treasure to collect. There's a 5-minute timer, once this ends your score will be shown and saved. 

Development 

Programming and Art by me Ronnie, head of Rowlin Studios.
